Text.Page:
Be prepared. That's my motto, or it would be if I started having a motto.

If your experience with your leopard friend goes...poorly, I want a soporific on hand to put the beast safely to sleep. Something dreamy would be nice.

4

Ah, yes. A morpheutic draught. That will do nicely.

We don't want to hurt the animal, just make it so it doesn't eat your face.4
I certainly wouldn't approach a beast this size without a draught.
